name: Accelerant
desc: Capital markets advisory firm. Not the insurtech Accelerant Holdings (NYSE: ACHL). Limited public info available.

leaders.bg: 22+ years leadership and PE expertise. Army veteran. Bridges funding needs with growth opportunities.

name: Lendmate
desc: NYC small business lending solutions (est. 2023). Business loan matching and capital structuring. Helps companies break free from daily payment cycles. MCA consolidation solutions. Building partnerships through Business Loan Partner Program.

leaders.bg: Front-line advisor matching businesses with funding products.

name: Stellar Capital
desc: Smithtown, NY (Long Island) business funding. MCA, real estate lending, equipment finance, SBA, LOC. Up to $50M. 50+ years combined team experience. First position loans from $75K starting at 6.99%.

leaders.bg: In commercial equipment finance since 1997. Expanded to MCA, SBA, LOC in 2008. Deep industry veteran.

name: Parkview Advance
desc: Stamford, CT alt lender (est. 2018). ~20 employees. LOC, AR financing, SBA, equipment financing, ABL. Founder Matthew Walsh previously at Premium Merchant Funding. UConn grad. Growing rapidly, recognized as top small business lender.

leaders.bg: UConn grad. Ex-Funding Specialist at Premium Merchant Funding. Built Parkview from scratch into multi-product lender.

name: Maverick Funding
desc: Fresh Meadows, NY direct MCA funder using own capital (est. 2020). 1-10 employees. $5K-$1M funding. 1-day approvals. Minimal paperwork (app + 3 months bank statements). Serves logistics, retail, medical. CEO Igor Davidov (John Jay College CUNY).

leaders.bg: John Jay College (CUNY). Founded 2020. Passionate about helping entrepreneurs of all credit types. Actively growing ISO partnerships.

name: Barclays Advance
desc: Boca Raton-based direct MCA funder (not affiliated with Barclays bank). Sources deals through ISO/broker channel. Currently hiring for ISO Relations roles, indicating growth. Arieh Kaplan manages broker relationships as Head of ISO Relations. Panelist at DeBanked Connect 2026. Lower online profile t

leaders.bg: Previously Funding Specialist at Barclays Advance. Now leads ISO/broker relationship management. DeBanked panelist.

name: Optimum Bank
desc: Fort Lauderdale community bank (NYSE American: OPHC). Record 2025: $1.11B assets (19% growth), $16.64M net earnings. SBA Preferred Lender status. $700M CRE mortgage portfolio. Launching HUD/FHA lending subsidiary for multifamily and healthcare in 2026. New API-based core banking platform. Panelist S

leaders.bg: JD from FIU (2010). Former SEC Legal Intern. Restructured $5B in CMBS debt. Previously at Lee & Associates and Hart Advisors. Partner in fund managing 60+ manufactured housing communities. DeBanked panelist.

name: Greenspoon Marder
desc: Full-service law firm, 225+ attorneys, 20+ US offices. Robby Birnbaum leads Regulatory Compliance & Financial Services practice. Nation’s leading legal expert on debt settlement. Represents 500+ companies in financial services, defending against CFPB, FTC, and State AG actions. Speaking on “Merchant

leaders.bg: UW-Madison (Poli Sci + English, 1996; JD 1999). 25+ yrs at Greenspoon Marder. Represents 500+ companies. Board of Association for Consumer Debt Relief. Former President of American Fair Credit Council and NACSO. Boca Raton Top Lawyers 2025. SFL Business Journal 40 Under 40 (2012).

name: Commercial Capital Connect
desc: Super broker matching small businesses with funding sources across MCA, term loans, LOC, invoice factoring, equipment leasing, SBA loans. 30+ year industry veteran. Already uses AI: built BrokerBuddy (AI trained on lender guidelines for deal matching), AI receptionists, and automated lead qualificat

leaders.bg: 30+ yr industry veteran. Built BrokerBuddy AI. Entrepreneur since age 12. Self-taught in finance. LinkedIn: fundingsniper007. Calls herself ‘The Loan Arranger.’ Pivoted from residential mortgage to commercial finance post-2008 crisis. Previously at Rainstar Capital Group. Douglasville, GA (Atlanta metro).

name: Smart MCA
desc: End-to-end SaaS platform for MCA companies: risk analysis, deal flow management, CRM, payment scheduling, and reporting from one dashboard. Founded 2017. Fully customizable. Targets MCA funders who want to manage their entire operation from a single system. Tech demo presenter at deBanked.

leaders.bg: NJIT Electrical Engineering. CISSP certified. Previously at NICE Systems/Qognify, CloudScann (CTO), Alfred AI (CTO), OOTB Technologies (CEO). Built SmartMCA from scratch in 2017. Passaic, NJ.

name: Figure
desc: America’s #1 non-bank HELOC lender. NASDAQ: FIGR. IPO’d Sep 2025 at ~$7.6B valuation. $17B+ in home equity lending on Provenance Blockchain. 168 active lending partners. 77% of originations through embedded/white-label partnerships. Launched YLDS (first SEC-approved yield-bearing stablecoin). Tech d

leaders.bg: Boston College. Previously at Citi (FIG, Strategy, Citi Ventures), Marble Pay (Head of Revenue Ops). Builds white-label lending relationships for Figure’s HELOC platform.

name: OnyxIQ
desc: All-in-one digital lending platform for MCA and alternative lending. Built by Jay Keller (CEO of Wall Street Funding, 17+ yrs in MCA). Melville, NY. Automates origination, underwriting, syndication, collections, portfolio management. “Developed for MCA providers by MCA providers.” Tech demo presente

leaders.bg: Fordham Univ Gabelli School of Business (Info Systems, 2022). Men’s Basketball Manager. Previously at Lenox Advisors, Fieldtech.ai. Joined OnyxIQ Sep 2025. Austin, TX.

name: Cloudsquare
desc: #1-rated lending platform built natively on Salesforce. Automates lead-to-funding-to-servicing. Products: CS Lend (MCA/loan mgmt), CS Broker (broker CRM), IntelliParse (AI bank statement parsing via Heron Data). Pivoted 2025 from general Salesforce consulting to exclusively serve alt-lending. Co-fou

leaders.bg: Salesforce ecosystem since 2011. Previously at IBISWorld (BD Manager). Co-founded Cloudsquare ~2015. Based in LA.

name: Ocrolus
desc: AI-powered document analysis platform for lenders. $80M Series C (Feb 2025) at $500M+ valuation. 99%+ accuracy, trained on 15M+ applications across 175+ funders. Launched Encore (Oct 2025) — cash flow data sharing platform for SMB funding. Brown University alum Snitkof co-founded Orchard Platform (a

leaders.bg: Brown Univ (Economics). Co-founded Orchard Platform (acquired by Kabbage). Previously at Amex, Citigroup, Kabbage (Head of Analytics). Writes Fintech AI Review newsletter on Substack. Conference regular (Money 20/20, deBanked).

name: The LCF Group / Reliant Funding
desc: Direct MCA funder since 2011 (as Last Chance Funding). West Hempstead, NY. ~75 employees. Acquired Reliant Funding assets Sep 2023 ($3B+ total funded, $125M securitization facility). Reliant is LCF’s “prime paper” arm. Factor rates 1.10-1.40, up to $2M. COO John Merturi (ex-DFC Global, ex-NASDAQ).

leaders.bg: Leads overall strategy. Built LCF from 2011 into multi-brand funder. Acquired Reliant assets 2023.
Named CEO Aug 2021 (formerly CMO). Runs the Reliant prime paper division.
Previously CFO for 3.5 years. 15+ yrs finance. Ex-DFC Global, ex-NASDAQ listed firms.
Heads the underwriting department. DIRECT BUYER for underwriting automation tools.
CFO since Oct 2018. Oversees financial strategy and portfolio performance.

name: Reliance Financial
desc: Revenue-based financing provider, Farmingdale, NJ. Up to $5M per transaction. Record origination month Nov 2025. Secured strategic capital partnership with specialty finance firm (May 2025). Launched new business lending platform for UT and TX merchants (Sep 2025). Hired new Head of Underwriting and

leaders.bg: Industry veteran. Founded and leads Reliance Financial. Based in Farmingdale, NJ. Driving rapid growth.

name: Blade Funding
desc: MCA funder and small business lender, Aventura, FL. Short-term loans up to $250K, LOC up to $100K. Funds as fast as 24 hours. Focused on small-to-mid market businesses. Lanyard sponsor at deBanked Connect.

leaders.bg: Founder and operator. Based in Aventura, FL.
Heads underwriting decisions. DIRECT BUYER for AI underwriting tools.
Manages broker relationships and deal flow.

name: Novac Equities
desc: Direct MCA funder, Miami, FL (est. Nov 2021). Two tiers: B-C Paper up to $3M ($75K+ monthly rev) and MICRO platform ($10K+ monthly rev). Same-day funding. BBB accredited Dec 2024 (A+ rating). 2-10 employees. Jake is also invested in professional padel (Novac WPR Road to Miami Circuit).

leaders.bg: Started as loan broker in NYC. Founded Novac Nov 2021. Also invests in professional padel (Novac WPR circuit).
Day-to-day operations management.
Manages broker relationships and deal sourcing.

name: Diesel Funding
desc: Direct MCA funder, North Miami Beach, FL (est. 2017). Known for funding complex and higher-risk deals that other funders won’t touch. Same-day capability. Performance-based funding decisions tied to actual business revenue. Small team (2-10).

leaders.bg: Founder and primary operator. Based in North Miami Beach, FL. Runs underwriting and operations.

name: APP Funding
desc: Direct MCA funder, NYC (29 W 36th St). MCAs $10K-$5M. No collateral required. Repayment tied to daily credit card sales. BBB accredited Jul 2023. Very small team (~3 employees). Claims 500+ brands funded.

leaders.bg: Leads APP Funding operations.
Previously ISO Manager. Now handles operations and deal evaluation.
